thread.title: Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield's emotional tribute to Denise Robertson as they win at the NTAs
thread.title_full: Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield's emotional tribute to Denise Robertson as they win at the NTAs

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield's emotional tribute to Denise Robertson as they win at the NTAs
text:
Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield's emotional tribute to Denise Robertson as they win at the NTAs The pair dedicated their best Live Magazine Show award to the agony aunt Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Philip and Holly say they are both getting tattoos after NTAs win Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield paid tribute to This Morning's late Denise Robertson as they won a National Television Award for their ITV show. 
When the winner of Best Live Magazine Show was announced, Holly looked as though she was going to cry as she and Phillip – along with co-presenters Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford – made their way to the stage. 
Phillip made a few bottom lips wobble as he told the audience that he and Holly were feeling Denise's loss tonight, after the agony aunt passed away last March following a short battle with pancreatic cancer. Read More NTAs 2017: EastEnders newbie Shaheen Jafargholi REALLY wants to win best soap Phillip Schofieldand Holly Willoughby won Best Live Magazine Show for This Morning (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
"We'll start on a serious note, just to say this time last year we had Denise Robertson on stage with us. And we really miss her, so this is for Denise this year," he said while holding the gong aloft. 
But the pair were determined to celebrate their win, with both of them making jokes about last year's NTAs – and the aftermath, when they both turned up to present This Morning with huge hangovers. 
"This frock is going to look amazing with piccalilli all over it," quipped Phillip about Holly's gorgeous pink gown. Hollyand Phil paid tribute to their late agony aunt (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Phil also joked about Holly getting her dress dirty (Photo: WENN.com) 
Holly also thanked fans for voting for the show, telling them: "What are you doing to us, you crazy people? We love, love, LOVE doing this show, it's so special to us. I love working with Phil – I'm so lucky to sit next to my best friend every day." 
"Obviously we shamed ourselves last year so we're not going to do that again this year. We're going to get tattoos!" added Phil as Holly collapsed into giggles.
